Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus cereus (MIC=25 µg/ml), Leuconostoc lactis (MIC=3 µg/ml), Listeria innocua (MIC=25 µg/ml), Micrococcus luteus (MIC=12 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=25 µg/ml), Staphylococcus epidermidis (MIC=12 µg/ml), Streptococcus uberis (MIC=25 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Shows antibacterial activity gaginst several Gram-positive bacteria.

Literature.Title: The solution structure of uperin 3.6, an antibiotic peptide from the granular dorsal glands of the Australian toadlet, Uperoleia mjobergii.
Literature.Author: Chia BC, Carver JA, Mulhern TD, Bowie JH.
